div.p: The MVPs are in need of people to run for office for next year. While you are welcome to run for any position, at this time the following positions need to be filled for next year: Vice President and Secretary. We would like to collect a list of those who are interested in running. We are in the process of figuring out how to run an election. If you are interested in running or have questions regarding any of the positions, please call Holly Gedeon (330) 842-0622.
